entry.title: How to Create a Blog Using Hexo in 10 Minutes
entry.content:
Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework. You write posts in Markdown (or other markup languages) and Hexo generates static files with a beautiful theme in seconds.

What’s more, you can publish the static files to GitHub as your blog or your projects’ introduction easily and free of charge!

1. Preparations

  1. Hexo documentation
  2. Install Git (see documentation above)
  3. Install Node.js (see documentation)
  4. Install Hexo

2. Create a Hexo Website Locally

Most frequently used Hexo commands:

  1. hexo n <article-title> # Creates a new article. hexo n == hexo new
  2. hexo n page <page-name> # Creates a new page
  3. hexo g / hexo generate # Generate static files
  4. hexo s / hexo server # Start a local server. It will watch for changes automatically.
  5. hexo d / hexo deploy
  6. hexo clean # Cleans the cache file (db.json) and generated files (public).
